newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Nuko initiated as "buy".
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Nuko initiated as "buy".

text.p: -- Unterberg Harris analyst analyst Tejinder Singh said he initiated coverage of NUKO Information Systems Inc with a buy rating.
-- He said he expected NUKO to grow revenues to $72.2 million in 1997 from $10.9 million in 1996 and earnings to a profit of $0.75 from a loss of $1.02 per share in the same period.
-- "In our opinion, NUKO provides an excellent investment opportunity for very aggressive growth oriented investors," Singh said in a research note.
